metadata.description: Claude Code skills collection by Executioner1939

plugins.name: moonrepo
plugins.description: Build, run, and manage monorepo tasks with moon. Comprehensive moonrepo documentation, commands, CI/CD patterns, and Docker integration.

plugins.name: utoipa
plugins.description: Rust library for auto-generating OpenAPI documentation from code. Complete utoipa macro reference, schema definitions, and integration patterns for Axum, Actix-web, and Rocket.

plugins.name: eventcatalog
plugins.description: Document event-driven architectures with EventCatalog. Complete API reference for domains, services, events, commands, queries, channels, flows, and entities.
